modName: More Features ITA and ENG Versions
summary: New Armor Sets and weapons (retex of existing ones) plus more features and modified ones.
descriptionHtml:
Hi Guys

This project is getting updated step by step and I am glad to show you new features and new items.
Lots of things to do but this project is in a good development point.

Here the list updated of all the changes made so far. 

[b][size=3]More Features[/b][/size]:
[list]
[*]Added Silver sword and Silver great sword and available for forging and upgrading,
[*]Adjusted settings relating the two different versions of steel armor, the one without shoulder provides less protection,
[*]Adjusted setting relating the Imperial Light Cuirass and the Imperial Studded Cuirass, in the vanilla version both of them were equal by the stats, but now Imperial Light Cuirass provides less protection than the Imperial Studded Cuirass,
[*]Now it\'s available crafting Long bow, Imperial bow, Hunting bow, Imperial Sword, all the Imperial Light Armor set, and the bow requires some firewood as does the Imperial Shield, Imperial Light Shield, Iron Shield, Steel Shield,
[*]Added Lockpicks ready for forging,
[*]Imperial Studded Cuirass and Scaled Cuirass with horn are now available for upgrading,

[b]Note[/b]

More updates will be release as soon I will notice something strange in the vanilla settings, feel free to let me know about it.

In the Main section I included all the works I done so far. I preferred release them separately because it\'s easiest to change some mistakes relating just only one work, instead of fixing the entire pack and then upload it in the site (which takes a lot of time if the pack has big dimensions).

[b][size=3]Silver Plate Armor Set[/b][/size]:

[b]Armor[/b]

[*]Silver Plate Boots,
[*]Silver Plate Cuirass,
[*]Silver Plate Gauntlets,
[*]Silver Plate Helmet,

[b][size=3]Bronze Plate Armor Set[/b][/size]:

[b]Items[/b]

[*]Bronze Ingot,

[b]Armor[/b]

[*]Bronze Plate Boots,
[*]Bronze Plate Cuirass,
[*]Bronze Plate Gauntlets,
[*]Bronze Plate Helmet,

[b][size=3]Carbon Fiber Set[/b][/size]:

[b]Items[/b]

[*]Carbon Fiber Coating,
[*]Carbon Fiber Strips,

[b]Armor[/b]

[*]Carbon Fiber Shield,

[b]Weapon[/b]

[*]Carbon Fiber Sword,
[*]Carbon Fiber Great Sword,

[b][size=3]New Features[/b][/size]:

[*]All the new items are now available at the merchants,
[*]All the items now requires specific smithing levels and there are no more ad hoc smithing perk,

[b]Note[/b]:

- All the new items can be forged at the Skyforge,
- The Bronze Plate Armor is a bit stronger than Steel Plate Armor,
- The Silver Plate Armor is a bit stronger than Bronze Plate Armor,
- The Carbon Fiber Weapons are a bit stronger and faster than Ebony Weapons,
[/list]
[b]Installation[/b]:

Just download the file that suits your language. You can download them manually or using NMM.
Current available languages: Italian, English;

[b]NOTE FOR UPGRADING[/b]

NMM INSTALLING VERSION
Deactivate the old esp file then install the new version with NMM and activate the esp file.

MANUAL INSTALLING VERSION
If you\'re upgrading form an old version deactivate the old esp file then overwrite everything once installed so activate the new esp file.

To do list:

- Improve the upgrading system for armors and weapons;
- Gold Plate Armor;
- Carbon Fiber Armor;

Feel free to adding new images of the mod.

I re-organized the download section and now is fully available downloading and installing directly through NMM so it means that there are no more sub-folder in the rar packs that may prevent a  proper installation.

That\'s all for now.

If you like it endorse it ;) A strong motivation to me to keep on this work and a signla that my work is appreciated ;)

The rights for this mod belong to me and if You want to use this mod for your own projects I\'ll have nothing in contrary to say just ask me first my authorization.
author: WyvernADR

files.name: ITA More Features
files.changelogHtml:
Revisited and corrected textures of Carbon Fiber Weapons with now normal maps correct.
Added Imperial Studded Cuirass, and Scaled Cuirass with horn are now available for upgrading
Corrected smithing parameters for Bronze Plate Armor Set
Corrected smithing parameters for Silver Plate Armor Set
